description: Foundation Koren [Root] is a non-governmental organization that actively supports the development of urban gardening and composting in Sofia. Its multiple implemented projects include support for the creation of urban gardens in inter-residential spaces and schools, training in home composting, an action to save the chestnut trees in the central Sofia district of Oborishte, seed exchange. "Koren" maintains a national online platform for sustainable practices (https: //www.koren.bg/node/23), working to promote sustainable practices not only in agriculture, but also in architecture, culture and education. Its goals are to preserve and improve natural resources, landscapes, biodiversity and people's quality of life.
name: Foundation Koren
